generated_text:
- road: The image shows a paved road with white lane markings and directional arrows, indicating it is a roadway for vehicle traffic.
- building: Several buildings are visible in the background and to the sides, including multi-story structures and smaller commercial buildings.
- vegetation: Trees and other greenery are visible, particularly in the background and along the roadside.
- sky: The sky is visible above the buildings and trees, showing a partly cloudy sky.
- person: A person can be seen standing near the construction barriers on the right side of the road.
- car: Multiple cars are visible on the road and parked along the sides, including a black car directly in front of the viewpoint.
- truck: A large orange truck is visible in the background, parked or moving along the road.
- fence: A fence is visible on the far right side of the image, likely part of a construction site or property boundary.
- pole: Several red and white striped poles are visible along the road, used as construction barriers.
- traffic sign: A blue circular traffic sign with an upward arrow is visible on a pole in the middle distance.
- terrain: Piles of dirt and gravel are visible along the roadside, indicating construction or excavation work.
